definition: to serve in the army/to be a soldier
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
soldiers/a force/an army/weapons/arms/military/warlike/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: After graduation from high school they went soldiering.
sentences.chinese: 中學畢業後他們去當兵。

sentences.english: The languages I learned in the Army came in handy.
sentences.chinese: 我在部隊當兵時學到的語言派上了用場。

sentences.english: However, many Swiss committee suicide by using such guns;
sentences.chinese: 不過，很多瑞士人就用當兵時公家發的槍枝自殺。

sentences.english: My older brother was always gone. He is served in the army for 31 years.
sentences.chinese: 我大哥總是不在家，因爲他當兵，一當就是31年。

sentences.english: REJECT】He tried to join the army but was rejected because of his poor health.
sentences.chinese: 他想當兵，可是因健康不好而被拒絕。

sentences.english: And supposedly, some men went out for the army, signed on.
sentences.chinese: 據說，有人出去當兵，簽了生死書。

sentences.english: This was the battle theater in which my father had served.
sentences.chinese: 這裏是我父親當兵時曾經到過的戰場。

sentences.english: He hopes to go soldiering after his college graduation.
sentences.chinese: 他希望大學畢業後去當兵。

sentences.english: Sometimes soldiers can be so unreasonable.
sentences.chinese: 當兵的有時候就是這麼不講道理。

sentences.english: Xian-min liu learned that after the arrangement of his father, he dont want to go to a soldier.
sentences.chinese: 劉憲民得知他爸的安排後十分惱火，他不想去當兵。

sentences.english: I shall go and enlist for a soldier , and never see my dear Toad Hall any more!
sentences.chinese: 我要報名當兵去，永不再見我親愛的蟾宮了。

sentences.english: The older students fell out quietly and drifted away to enlistments.
sentences.chinese: 年紀大點的學生先後悄悄地退學，入伍當兵去了。

sentences.english: The prince is going to a soldier, dont give up his childhood sweetheart lover core.
sentences.chinese: 王子尚要去當兵，不捨他的青梅竹馬的戀人子芯。

sentences.english: Who serves as a soldier at his own expense?
Although we got married when I was a private I had confidence about the future.
sentences.chinese: 雖然當我們結婚時我仍在當兵但對於未來我有信心。

sentences.english: His regular engagement ends soon, but he's thinking of soldiering on.
sentences.chinese: 他的定期兵役就要結束了，但他還想繼續當兵。

definition: at that time
barracks/army camp
there
at the minimum/at the very least
to go abroad/to leave the country/emigration
to change one's profession/to transfer to civilian work
then/at that time/in those days
see 沒關係|没关系[mei2 guan1 xi5]
not bad/tolerable/fortunately
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
to speak the truth/truth to tell/frankly
to hear (sth said)/one hears (that)/hearsay/listening and speaking
to make a movie
to read/to study
to persuade
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
to get married and have kids/to start a family
